abstract_ssm: The items include an indenture of apprenticeship, binding Samuel Booth (1818-1894) to Elias Combs as a house carpenter, dated 1835, and a letter from Samuel B. Chittenden to Mayor Samuel Booth, offering money to finance a civic reception Honoring General Philip Sheridan, dated 1867.
